about_the_game:
"Ultimate Daifugo" is the ultimate trump card game "Daifugo" app packed with plenty of local rules.

The card game "Daifugo" is famous trump card game.
We packed a lot of local rules from famous ones that everyone knows to minor ones.
You can enjoy a fresh trump card game "Daifugo" that cannot be experienced with existing apps.
Specializing in online battles, with against up to 4 people via the Internet.

*** This application is not yet localized to English. The localization is on the working. Please wait a little.

Numerous local rules not found in existing apps

Famous ones of course...

・Spade 3 Return, 8-Cut, 7-Pass, 10-Discard, J-Back, Revolution, Sandstorm, 4-Stop, 5-Skip, 9-Reverse, Coup d'etat, 7-Three Revolution, 99-Car, Rokurokubi, Omen, Miyako Ochi, Q-bomber

The following local rules are also implemented (*: To be implemented)
・DEATH, Lucky Seven, Enhanced 8-Cut, Enhanced J-Back, Jeanne d'Arc, Nero, Picture Card Breaker, Gekokujo, Cataclysm, Down Number*, Great Revolution, Zombie, Arthur*, Supply, Absolute Revolution

More local rules will be added in the future.
You can enjoy a millionaire with a much wider range of strategies, which is a bit different from the usual millionaire!

Play with everyone through the Internet on each device

This application specializes in online battles. You can enjoy communication battles with 2 to 4 people.
Applications are available for iPhone / iPad / Android smartphones / tablets / Mac / Windows PC, so you can participate in online battles on any device.
Let's enjoy the ultimate Daifugo together!
